pullrequest.title: Add support for OpenStack via the AWS layer

content.raw:
It's extremely slow but it works!
I was able to launch CloudSim and another CloudSim instance within it.

Some suggestions:
* Add the email into the create_cloudsim.py command.
* Just for the documentation explain a little the different types and options available for flavors.
* Explain what are the *. eucarc admin* and *. openrc admin* doing.
content.html:
It's extremely slow but it works! I was able to launch CloudSim and another CloudSim instance within it.

Some suggestions: Add the email into the create_cloudsim.py command. Just for the documentation explain a little the different types and options available for flavors. Explain what are the . eucarc admin and . openrc admin* doing.
